definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Take farmers as an example. They are now more fond of scientific farming.
sentences.chinese: 以农民为例，他们现在更乐于使用科学种田法。

sentences.english: Scientific farming is the key to the further development of agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 科学种田是进一步发展农业的关键。

sentences.english: The experts are busy with scientific farming.
sentences.chinese: 专家们正忙于科学种田。

sentences.english: The scientist is showing the method of scientific farming to the peasants.
sentences.chinese: 那位科学家正在向农民示范科学种田的方法。

sentences.english: Owing to scientific farming skills steady annual increase of crop has been obtained.
sentences.chinese: 由于采用科学种田粮食产量逐年增长。

definition: to rise from poverty and become prosperous (idiom)/poverty alleviation
cooperative/workers' or agricultural producers' cooperative etc
our peasant friends (political term used in the early years of the Old Democratic Revolution, 1840-1919)/(Tw) (coll.) farmer
fixing of farm output quotas for each household
to make preparations for plowing and sowing
green pest prevention and control/environmentally friendly methods of pest control and prevention
pinyin: bing4 chong2 hai4 lu:4 se4 fang2 kong4
